text: hamane har samudaay mein koee na koee rasool bheja ki "allaah kee bandagee karo aur taagoot se bacho." phir unamen se kisee ko to allaah ne seedhe maarg par lagaaya aur unamen se kisee par pathabhrasht siddh hokar rahee. phir tanik dharatee mein chal-phirakar to dekho ki jhuthalaanevaalon ka kaisa parinaam hua
